file_content.text: This thing doubles as a listening array--we're trying to get intel on Mannett Point.
You're in charge of communications? I found a relay at a separatist safe house--they were tapping your signals.
Blast--I thought we'd put a stop to that a month ago.
I'll red-flag all recent transmissions, make sure nothing major leaked. I owe you one.
Take a look; you can see clear to Mannett Point.
